name: alt-tab-current-monitor
description: GNOME Shell extension that makes Alt+Tab only show/cycle windows from the current monitor
author: Emi Bemol

scripts.prepare-dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r schemas dist/ && cp metadata.json dist/
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run compile-schemas && npm run prepare-dist && cd dist && zip -r ../alt-tab-current-monitor.zip .
scripts.install-extension: gnome-extensions disable alt-tab-current-monitor@esauvisky.github.io; npm run pack && gnome-extensions install alt-tab-current-monitor.zip --force && gnome-extensions enable alt-tab-current-monitor@esauvisky.github.io
